Interactive plot of 2d intensity data

Source: R/plot_intensity_2d.R
plot_intensity_2d.Rd

Interactive plot of 2d intensity data

Usage

plot_intensity_2d(
  data,
  channel_1,
  channel_2,
  bins = 500,
  plot_all = FALSE,
  plotly = T
)

Arguments

data

data

channel_1

channel 1

channel_2

channel 2

bins

Number of bins

plot_all

If FALSE, takes subsample of 500,000 data points to plot

plotly

Make plot interactive using plotly
